title: We’re Cursing More. Blame the #%$ Pandemic.
sub_head: Stress, the erosion of boundaries between personal and professional, and an exhausted slide toward casualness have created a perfect storm for swearing
body:
In November, Jay Rosenthal unexpectedly found himself uttering a curse word—at his children’s school.
He’s on the board there, and he and some fellow board members were touring impressive new classrooms for the first time. “Holy shit!” he exclaimed.
